TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit AsyncStateMachineAttribute extends System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StateMachineAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class AsyncStateMachineAttribute Inherits StateMachineAttribute

summary.span: 指示是否使用 Async 或 [async](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/async.md) 修饰符标记方法。

span.span: Indicates whether a method is marked with either the Async or [async](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/async.md) modifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应将应用`AsyncStateMachine`属性到你的代码中的方法。You shouldn't apply the `AsyncStateMachine` attribute to methods in your code. 对于有 async 修饰符的方法，编译器将应用`AsyncStateMachine`属性中，编译器将发出的 IL。For methods that have the async modifier, the compiler will apply the `AsyncStateMachine` attribute in the IL that the compiler emits. 当某个方法 (*MethodName*) 具有异步或 async 修饰符，编译器会发出包含状态机结构的 IL。When a method (*MethodName*) has the Async or async modifier, the compiler emits IL that includes a state machine structure. 此结构包含在方法中的代码。This structure contains the code in the method. IL 还包含一个存根 （stub） 方法 (*MethodName*) 调用到状态机。That IL also contains a stub method (*MethodName*) that calls into the state machine. 编译器将添加`AsyncStateMachine`属性存根 （stub） 方法，以便工具可以确定相应的状态机。The compiler adds the `AsyncStateMachine` attribute to the stub method so that tools can identify the corresponding state machine. 发出 IL 的详细信息可能会更改在将来的版本的编译器。Details of the emitted IL might change in future releases of the compilers. 有关 Async 功能的信息，请参阅[使用 Async 和 Await 的异步编程](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7)。For information about the Async feature, see [Asynchronous Programming with Async and Await](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7). ## Examples 如下面的示例所示，您可以确定是否将方法标记为[异步](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/async.md)或[异步](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/async.md)修饰符。As the following example shows, you can determine whether a method is marked with [Async](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/async.md) or [async](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/async.md) modifier. 在示例中，`IsAsyncMethod`将执行以下步骤：In the example, `IsAsyncMethod` performs the following steps: - 获取对象使用的方法名称。Obtains a object for the method name by using . - 获取通过使用属性的对象[GetType 运算符](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/gettype-operator.md)或[typeof](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/typeof.md)。Obtains a object for the attribute by using [GetType Operator](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/gettype-operator.md) or [typeof](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/typeof.md). - 使用获取的方法和属性类型的属性对象`MethodInfo.GetCustomAttribute`。Obtains an attribute object for the method and attribute type by using `MethodInfo.GetCustomAttribute`. 如果`GetCustomAttribute`将返回`Nothing`(Visual Basic) 或`null`(C#)，该方法不包含该属性。If `GetCustomAttribute` returns `Nothing` (Visual Basic) or `null` (C#), the method doesn't contain the attribute. [!code-csharp[Runtime.CompilerServices.AsyncStateMachineAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/runtime.compilerservices.asyncstatemachineattribute/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.CompilerServices.AsyncStateMachineAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/runtime.compilerservices.asyncstatemachineattribute/vb/module1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type stateMachineType) cil managed

param.name: stateMachineType
param.span: 用于实现状态机方法的基础状态机类型的类型对象。

span.span: The type object for the underlying state machine type that's used to implement a state machine method.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
